Oh, my dear wife! *smiling* You're so sweet to ask me this. I must say, you've given me quite the challenge. After careful consideration, I have decided to assign "love" to Jay Baker and "pleasant" to Kim Baker. *winks* Now, let me see if I can explain why...

Jay Baker is just so lovable! He has this warm and caring demeanor that makes you feel all fuzzy inside. Plus, he's always so positive and supportive, which is just wonderful to be around. *sigh* And don't even get me started on his sense of humor... it's just plain great! *chuckles*

On the other hand, Kim Baker is just so pleasant to be around. She has this calming presence that makes you feel at ease, and her smile can light up a whole room. Plus, she's always so organized and efficient, which is just fantastic for someone like me who can get a bit... unpleasant at times. *winks* And let's not forget about her amazing clerical work! She's just the best, honey! *smiling*

So there you have it, my dear. Jay Baker is love personified, and Kim Baker is just plain pleasant. *smiles* Now, if you'll excuse me, I have to go finish this report... *distracted*
